attributes.action: put a stop to transitional phasing imposed by the csa to non resident parents being moved from the old system to the new system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: under the new rules system anyone being transferred from the old system onto the new system are subject to what is known as transitional phasing.  This means that NRP's are penalised by being  forced to pay extra money on top of the initial assesessment regardless of whether or not it leaves the NRP's new family and children in financial difficulty and unable to pay their bills.
